com.centurylink.mdw.services.event

Interface ServiceHandler


  • public interface ServiceHandler
    Abstraction of a Service processor so that other handlers such as Camel routes can register to respond to MDW listener requests. (See EventManager.registerServiceHandler()).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getPath()
      The path along with getProtocol() are used to identify which requests the handler should respond to.
      String getProtocol()
      The protocol along with getPath() are used to identify which requests the handler should respond to.
      Object invoke(String request, Map<String,String> metaInfo)
      Performs the actions associated with the request and returns a response, which currently must be a String.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        Object invoke(String request,
              Map<String,String> metaInfo)
        Performs the actions associated with the request and returns a response, which currently must be a String. Could be used to configure a threadpool to handle the actual work.
        Parameters:
        request - the content of the request
        metaInfo - name/value pairs including protocol info such as request headers
        Returns:
        the response (currently must be a String or implement toString())

      • getProtocol

        String getProtocol()
        The protocol along with getPath() are used to identify which requests the handler should respond to.

      • getPath

        String getPath()
        The path along with getProtocol() are used to identify which requests the handler should respond to.
